entry.title: There is a need for reforms in the United Nations. Dr Fernand de Varennes

media:group.media:title: There is a need for reforms in the United Nations. Dr Fernand de Varennes
media:group.media:description:
Syuzi Muradyan has talked to Dr Fernand de Varennes, Former United Nations Special Rapporteur on Minority Issues about his visit to Armenia and the role of the United Nations in the protection of minority rights and conflict resolution.
